## Github Stats Card

**Create awesome Github Readme Stats Card.**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/jxmked/github-stats-card)
[![ref-official-doc]](https://github.com/jxmked/github-stats-card?tab=readme-ov-file#generate-yours-now)

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `username` | `string` | `true` |  | Github username |  |

</details>

```txt
https://gh-stats-card.vercel.app/api/{username}
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- jxmked -->
![jxmked GitHub stats](https://gh-stats-card.vercel.app/api/jxmked)
```

  <img src="https://gh-stats-card.vercel.app/api/jxmked" alt="jxmked GitHub stats" />
</div>
